name: Touch Detective 2 ½
description:
Accepted into the Great Detective Society, Mackenzie has become a
fully-accredited sleuth! Trouble is, people still do not take her
seriously. All that changes when a string of strange thefts pulls her
into a puzzling plot, and she’ll have to use all her skills and
intuition to discover the motive behind the crimes and solve the mystery.

Features

• Five new episodes
• Easy to identify interactive objects
•
Twice the locations as the first Touch Detective
